verses.verse: מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> Why מִ֭שַּׁדַּי <WH7706> from the Almighty לֹא־ <WH3808> not נִצְפְּנ֣וּ <WH6845> are not hidden עִתִּ֑ים <WH6256> Why seeing times [וְיֹדְעֹו כ] (וְ֝יֹדְעָ֗יו <WH3045> acknowledge ק) לֹא־ <WH3808> not חָ֥זוּ <WH2372> him not see יָמָֽיו׃ <WH3117> age
גְּבֻל֥וֹת <WH1367> the landmarks יַשִּׂ֑יגוּ <WH5381> [Some] remove עֵ֥דֶר <WH5739> flocks גָּ֝זְל֗וּ <WH1497> they violently take away וַיִּרְעֽוּ׃ <WH7462> and feed
חֲמ֣וֹר <WH2543> the ass יְתוֹמִ֣ים <WH3490> of the fatherless יִנְהָ֑גוּ <WH5090> They drive away יַ֝חְבְּל֗וּ <WH2254> for a pledge שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> ox אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <WH490> the widow's

יַטּ֣וּ <WH5186> They turn אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <WH34> the needy מִדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way יַ֥חַד <WH3162> themselves together חֻ֝בְּא֗וּ <WH2244> hide עֲנִיֵּי־ <WH6035> humble אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold פְּרָאִ֨ים ׀ <WH6501> Behold [as] wild asses בַּֽמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> in the desert יָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> go they forth בְּ֭פָעֳלָם <WH6467> to their work מְשַׁחֲרֵ֣י <WH7836> rising betimes לַטָּ֑רֶף <WH2964> for a prey עֲרָבָ֥ה <WH6160> the wilderness ל֥וֹ לֶ֝֗חֶם <WH3899> [yieldeth] food לַנְּעָרִֽים׃ <WH5288> for them [and] for [their] children

בַּ֭שָּׂדֶה <WH7704> in the field בְּלִיל֣וֹ <WH1098> [every one] his corn [יַקְצִירוּ כ] (יִקְצֹ֑ורוּ <WH7114> cut down ק) וְכֶ֖רֶם <WH3754> the vintage רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> of the wicked יְלַקֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <WH3953> and they gather

עָר֣וֹם <WH6174> They cause the naked יָ֭לִינוּ <WH3885> to lodge מִבְּלִ֣י <WH1097> without לְב֑וּשׁ <WH3830> without clothing וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and have כְּ֝ס֗וּת <WH3682> that [they have] no covering בַּקָּרָֽה׃ <WH7135> in the cold

מִזֶּ֣רֶם <WH2230> with the showers הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> of the mountains יִרְטָ֑בוּ <WH7372> They are wet וּֽמִבְּלִ֥י <WH1097> want מַ֝חְסֶ֗ה <WH4268> for want of a shelter חִבְּקוּ־ <WH2263> and embrace צֽוּר׃ <WH6697> the rock
יִ֭גְזְלוּ <WH1497> They pluck מִשֹּׁ֣ד <WH7699> from the breast יָת֑וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless וְֽעַל־ <WH5764> sucking child עָנִ֥י <WH6041> of the poor יַחְבֹּֽלוּ׃ <WH2254> and take a pledge

עָר֣וֹם <WH6174> naked הִ֭לְּכוּ <WH1980> They cause [him] to go בְּלִ֣י <WH1097> without לְב֑וּשׁ <WH3830> without clothing וּ֝רְעֵבִ֗ים <WH7456> famish נָ֣שְׂאוּ <WH5375> and they take away עֹֽמֶר׃ <WH6016> the sheaf

בֵּין־ <WH996> within שׁוּרֹתָ֥ם <WH7791> their walls יַצְהִ֑ירוּ <WH6671> [Which] make oil יְקָבִ֥ים <WH3342> [their] winepresses דָּ֝רְכ֗וּ <WH1869> [and] tread וַיִּצְמָֽאוּ׃ <WH6770> and suffer thirst

מֵ֘עִ֤יר <WH5892> from out of the city מְתִ֨ים ׀ <WH4962> Men יִנְאָ֗קוּ <WH5008> groan וְנֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> and the soul חֲלָלִ֥ים <WH2491> of the wounded תְּשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <WH7768> crieth out וֶ֝אֱל֗וֹהַּ <WH433> yet God לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> layeth תִּפְלָֽה׃ <WH8604> not folly

הֵ֤מָּה ׀ <WH1992> Others הָיוּ֮ <WH1961> have been בְּֽמֹרְדֵ֫י־ <WH4775> They are of those that rebel א֥וֹר <WH216> against the light לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor הִכִּ֥ירוּ <WH5234> they know דְרָכָ֑יו <WH1870> not the ways וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יָ֝שְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> thereof nor abide בִּנְתִיבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5410> in the paths

לָא֡וֹר <WH216> with the light יָ֘ק֤וּם <WH6965> rising רוֹצֵ֗חַ <WH7523> The murderer יִֽקְטָל־ <WH6991> killeth עָנִ֥י <WH6041> the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> and needy וּ֝בַלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> and in the night יְהִ֣י <WH1961> is as כַגַּנָּֽב׃ <WH1590> is as a thief

וְעֵ֤ין <WH5869> The eye נֹאֵ֨ף ׀ <WH5003> also of the adulterer שָׁ֤מְרָֽה <WH8104> waiteth נֶ֣שֶׁף <WH5399> for the twilight לֵ֭אמֹר <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> No תְשׁוּרֵ֣נִי <WH7789> shall see עָ֑יִן <WH5869> No eye וְסֵ֖תֶר <WH5643> backbiting פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> [his] face יָשִֽׂים׃ <WH7760> appoint

חָתַ֥ר <WH2864> they dig through בַּחֹ֗שֶׁךְ <WH2822> In the dark בָּ֫תִּ֥ים <WH1004> houses יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> for themselves in the daytime חִתְּמוּ־ <WH2856> [which] they had marked לָ֗מוֹ לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָ֥דְעוּ <WH3045> they know אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> not the light

כִּ֤י <WH3588> even יַחְדָּ֨ו ׀ <WH3162> [is] to them even as בֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> For the morning לָ֣מוֹ צַלְמָ֑וֶת <WH6757> the shadow of death כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַ֝כִּ֗יר <WH5234> if [one] know בַּלְה֥וֹת <WH1091> [them they are in] the terrors צַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <WH6757> of the shadow of death

קַֽל־ <WH7031> He [is] swift ה֤וּא ׀ <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> the surface מַ֗יִם <WH4325> of the water תְּקֻלַּ֣ל <WH7043> is cursed חֶלְקָתָ֣ם <WH2513> their portion בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִ֝פְנֶה <WH6437> he beholdeth דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> not the way כְּרָמִֽים׃ <WH3754> of the vineyards

צִיָּ֤ה <WH6723> Drought גַם־ <WH1571> again חֹ֗ם <WH2527> and heat יִגְזְל֥וּ <WH1497> consume מֵֽימֵי־ <WH4325> waters שֶׁ֗לֶג <WH7950> the snow שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> [so doth] the grave חָטָֽאוּ׃ <WH2398> [those which] have sinned

יִשְׁכָּ֘חֵ֤הוּ <WH7911> shall forget רֶ֨חֶם ׀ <WH7358> The womb מְתָ֘ק֤וֹ <WH4988> shall feed sweetly רִמָּ֗ה <WH7415> him the worm ע֥וֹד <WH5750> longer לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is no יִזָּכֵ֑ר <WH2142> on him he shall be no more remembered וַתִּשָּׁבֵ֖ר <WH7665> shall be broken כָּעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> as a tree עַוְלָֽה׃ <WH5766> and wickedness

רֹעֶ֣ה <WH7462> He evil entreateth עֲ֭קָרָה <WH6135> the barren לֹ֣א <WH3808> no תֵלֵ֑ד <WH3205> [that] beareth וְ֝אַלְמָנָ֗ה <WH490> to the widow לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְיֵטִֽיב׃ <WH3190> not and doeth not good

וּמָשַׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> He draweth אַבִּירִ֣ים <WH47> also the mighty בְּכֹח֑וֹ <WH3581> with his power יָ֝ק֗וּם <WH6965> he riseth up וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> no יַאֲמִ֥ין <WH539> and no [man] is sure בַּֽחַיִּֽין׃ <WH2416> of life

יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> [Though] it be given ל֣וֹ לָ֭בֶטַח <WH983> him [to be] in safety וְיִשָּׁעֵ֑ן <WH8172> whereon he resteth וְ֝עֵינֵ֗יהוּ <WH5869> yet his eyes עַל־ <WH5921> are on דַּרְכֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1870> [are] upon their ways

ר֤וֹמּוּ <WH7426> They are exalted מְּעַ֨ט ׀ <WH4592> for a little while וְֽאֵינֶ֗נּוּ <WH369> are gone וְֽהֻמְּכ֗וּ <WH4355> but are gone and brought low כַּכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> everything יִקָּפְצ֑וּן <WH7092> they are taken out וּכְרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> as the tops שִׁבֹּ֣לֶת <WH7641> of the ears of corn יִמָּֽלוּ׃ <WH5243> as all [other] and cut off

וְאִם־ <WH518> now if לֹ֣א <WH3808> is not אֵ֭פוֹ <WH645> And if [it be] not [so] now מִ֣י <WH4310> who יַכְזִיבֵ֑נִי <WH3576> me a liar וְיָשֵׂ֥ם <WH7760> who will make לְ֝אַ֗ל <WH408> nay מִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH4405> my speech ס
